org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.coord.subprocess
Class AeSpCoordinator

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.coord.AeCoordinatingBase
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.coord.subprocess.AeSpCoordinatingBase
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.coord.subprocess.AeSpCoordinator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeCoordinating, IAeCoordinator, IAeSpCoordinating, IAeSpCoordinator
public class AeSpCoordinator
extends AeSpCoordinatingBase
implements IAeSpCoordinator

Implementation of a AE subprocess protcol coordinator. The aesp protocol is loosely based on Business Agreement protocol described in the BPEL-4WS 1.1, appendix C.

deregister

public void deregister()
                throws AeCoordinationException
Deregisters the current coordination with the invoke activity's enclosing scope. (The enclosing scope is not complete until all participants (subprocesses) have ended and deregistered.)

Specified by:
deregister in interface IAeCoordinator
Throws:
AeCoordinationException

compensateOrCancel

public void compensateOrCancel()
                        throws AeCoordinationException
Signals the activity under coordination (ie - the participant) to either compensate (if it has completed) or cancel (it if is still running). This method is normally send to participants in 'active' state during fault/comp handler execution.

Specified by:
compensateOrCancel in interface IAeCoordinator
Throws:
AeCoordinationException

onMessageCompleted

protected void onMessageCompleted(IAeProtocolMessage aMessage)
                           throws AeCoordinationException
Handle the COMPLETED message sent by the participant. On receiving the COMPLETED message, a compensation handler on behalf of the participant is installed into the invoke activity's enclosing scope.

Parameters:
aMessage -
Throws:
AeCoordinationException

onMessageExited

protected void onMessageExited(IAeProtocolMessage aMessage)
                        throws AeCoordinationException
Handle the EXITED message sent by the participant. The exited message indicates that the participant have transitioned to the ENDED state, hence this coordination will be removed (deregistered) from the invoke activity's enclosing scope.

Parameters:
aMessage -
Throws:
AeCoordinationException

onMessageCanceled

protected void onMessageCanceled(IAeProtocolMessage aMessage)
                          throws AeCoordinationException
Handle the CANCLED message sent by the participant. The cancled message indicates that the participant have transitioned to the ENDED state, hence this coordination will be removed (deregistered) from the invoke activity's enclosing scope.

Parameters:
aMessage -
Throws:
AeCoordinationException

onMessageClosed

protected void onMessageClosed(IAeProtocolMessage aMessage)
                        throws AeCoordinationException
Handle the CLOSED message sent by the participant. The closed message indicates that the participant have transitioned to the ENDED state, hence this coordination will be removed (deregistered) from the invoke activity's enclosing scope.

Parameters:
aMessage -
Throws:
AeCoordinationException

onMessageCompensated

protected void onMessageCompensated(IAeProtocolMessage aMessage)
                             throws AeCoordinationException
Handle the COMPENSATED message sent by the participant. The compensated message indicates that the participant have successfully compensated itself and have transitioned to the ENDED state. The installed compensation handler will be signaled that it completed. This coordination will be removed (deregistered) from the invoke activity's enclosing scope.

Parameters:
aMessage -
Throws:
AeCoordinationException

onMessageFaultedCompensating

protected void onMessageFaultedCompensating(IAeProtocolMessage aMessage)
                                     throws AeCoordinationException
Handle the FAULTED_COMPENSATED message sent by the participant. This message indicates that the participant faulted while compensating. This method signals the installed compensationHandler that it completedWithFault.

Parameters:
aMessage -
Throws:
AeCoordinationException

onMessageFaultedActive

protected void onMessageFaultedActive(IAeProtocolMessage aMessage)
                               throws AeCoordinationException
Handle the FAULTED_ACTIVE message sent by the participant. This message indicates that the participant have faulted.

Parameters:
aMessage -
Throws:
AeCoordinationException
